means: （文学、戏剧）（情节、时间和地点的）统一性
[地名] [加拿大、美国] 尤尼蒂

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"和谐，一致"之意。
means: harmony ： 指人与人之间或不同部分与整体之间完全协调、和谐、愉快，没有摩擦。
agreement ： 侧重态度与观点上的一致。
concord ： 多指人际、国家间或民族之间协调一致的关系。
unity ： 指各个成员、各群体之间相互协调一致的关系。
accord ： 指思想一致，彼此不矛盾，也指行动上的一致。

sentence.Network_en: She had hoped the couple would put on a show of unity.
sentence.Network_cn: 她曾经希望那对夫妇会表现出和睦相处的样子。

sentence.Network_en: Senior politicians met today to discuss the future of European economic unity.
sentence.Network_cn: 高级政要今天会晤，探讨欧洲经济一体化的未来。

sentence.Network_en: The unity of our society is threatened by troublesome and restless minorities.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们社会的团结遭到了一小撮滋扰生事、不安分守己的群体的威胁。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French unite, from Latin unitas, from unus 'one'

entry.def: Unity is the state of different areas or groups being joined together to form a single country or organization.

example.ex: Senior politicians met today to discuss the future of European economic unity.
example.tran: 高级政要今天会晤，探讨欧洲经济一体化的未来。

entry.def: When there is unity, people are in agreement and act together for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Speakers at the rally mouthed sentiments of unity...
example.tran: 集会上的发言人空泛地呼吁大家要团结一致。

means.word_mean: 1. an unreduced or unbroken completeness or totality
2. the smallest whole number or a numeral representing this number;

sentences.sentence: "he has the one but will need a two and three to go with it"

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of being united into one

auth_sentence.content: The show of unity was for the cameras only.
auth_sentence.res_content: The show of unity was for the cameras only.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The show of unity was for the cameras only.

auth_sentence.content: New "government of national unity" is unveiled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New "government of national unity" is unveiled.

auth_sentence.content: But this time there seemed to be joyous unity.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this time there seemed to be joyous unity.

stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一,单个+ped脚→adj.单足的,独腿的
unique独一无二+ly表副词→adv.独特地,唯一地,珍奇地
uni单一,单个+son声音→一个声音→和谐
unify[v.使联合,统一;使相同,使一致]+ication表名词→unification统一,单一化
uni单一,单个+on表名词→n.联合, 合并
uni单一,单个+t→n.个体,[计量]单位
uni单一,单个+ty表名词→n.团结;统一,一致,整体
unit个体+e→v.联合,团结;统一,合并 v.使联合

jushi.english: The figure on the left spoils the unity of the painting.
jushi.chinese: 画中左边的人物破坏了这幅画的整体性。
